name: War Hunter
description: War Hunter is a first person shooter where you take control of the special agents and must fight your way through a cold and mean scenery and find the arms dealer Talib.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 720 MB available space
